day1.title: Arrival in Rome
activities: Flight: Birmingham (BHM) → Atlanta → Rome Fiumicino (FCO)
Arrival late afternoon/early evening (~4:00-6:00 PM)
Airport transfer to Trastevere hotel
Evening stroll through Trastevere's cobblestone streets
Piazza di Santa Maria in Trastevere
Gelato at Fatamorgana
Dinner: Da Enzo al 29 or Tonnarello

day2.title: Rome Highlights
activities: Morning: Piazza Navona, Pantheon, coffee at Sant'Eustachio
Trevi Fountain, Spanish Steps
Afternoon/Evening: Vatican Museums & Sistine Chapel (pre-book)
St. Peter's Basilica, climb the dome

day3.title: Ancient Rome + Train to Naples
activities: Morning: Colosseum & Roman Forum (pre-book at coopculture.it)
Walk through Roman Forum – Temple of Saturn, Arch of Titus
Climb Palatine Hill for panoramic views
Afternoon: Frecciarossa high-speed train to Naples (1hr 10min, €45-80)
Evening: Wander Spaccanapoli, Pizza at L'Antica Pizzeria da Michele
Castel dell'Ovo at Sunset

day4.title: Naples & Pompeii
activities: Morning: Naples Underground, San Gregorio Armeno
Afternoon: Pompeii via Circumvesuviana train (35-40 min)
Must-see: Forum, House of the Faun, Garden of the Fugitives, Villa of the Mysteries

day5.title: Naples to Positano
activities: Transfer to Positano (private ~€120-150 or ferry ~€25-30)
Afternoon: Settle into Positano
Wander the steep staircases, Chiesa di Santa Maria Assunta
Spiaggia Grande beach, shop for handmade sandals
Sunset aperitivo at Franco's Bar

day6.title: Capri Island
activities: Ferry Positano → Capri (~1 hour, €22-25/person)
Morning: Attempt Blue Grotto if weather permits
Bus to Anacapri, Monte Solaro chairlift
Villa San Michele, Piazzetta, Gardens of Augustus

day7.title: Amalfi Coast & Ravello
activities: Morning: Amalfi Town – Duomo di Amalfi, Cloister of Paradise
Paper Museum, Limoncello tasting
Afternoon: Ravello – Villa Rufolo, Villa Cimbrone (Terrace of Infinity)
hiddenGems: Valle delle Ferriere (Valley of the Mills)

day8.title: Positano to Tuscany via Orvieto
activities: Private driver Positano → Chianti with Orvieto stop (~€350-400)
Midday Stop: Orvieto – Orvieto Duomo, Orvieto Underground
Try Orvieto Classico white wine
Evening: Arrive at agriturismo, farm dinner with house wines
hiddenGems: Pozzo di San Patrizio (St. Patrick's Well)

day9.title: Tuscan Wine Country
activities: Morning: Visit 1-2 Chianti Classico wineries (pre-book!)
Lunch: Dario Cecchini in Panzano (famous butcher)
Afternoon: Hilltop town visit – San Gimignano, Monteriggioni, or Radda
Evening: Dinner at agriturismo or cooking class

day10.title: Florence & Departure
activities: Drive Chianti → Florence (~45 min to 1 hour)
Drop rental car at Florence Airport or city center
Duomo & Brunelleschi's Dome (pre-book climb)
Piazza della Signoria, Ponte Vecchio
Leather shopping at San Lorenzo Market
Final gelato at Vivoli or Perche No!
Flight: Florence → Frankfurt/Munich → Atlanta → Birmingham
hiddenGems: Officina Profumo-Farmaceutica di Santa Maria Novella
